title: What is Udaan Agencies?
excerpt: Learn about Udaan Agencies - Nepal's premier manpower consultancy
content: Udaan Agencies is a premier manpower consultancy in Birtamod, Nepal specializing in connecting skilled and unskilled Nepali talent with reputable employers both locally and internationally. We provide comprehensive recruitment solutions for overseas employment and local job placement.
tags: udaan agencies, manpower consultancy, nepal, recruitment
author: admin-udaan-7075

title: Where is Udaan Agencies located?
excerpt: Find Udaan Agencies office location in Birtamod, Nepal
content: Our head office is strategically located in Atithi Sadan Road, Birtamod Municipality, Jhapa, Nepal, making it easily accessible for consultations and interviews. Visit us during office hours from 10:00 AM to 5:00 PM, Sunday to Friday.
tags: location, office, birtamod, jhapa, nepal, address
author: admin-udaan-7075

title: When was Udaan Agencies established?
excerpt: Learn about the founding and history of Udaan Agencies
content: Udaan Agencies was established in 2082 BS with a vision to transform the recruitment landscape in Nepal and has been serving clients and candidates reliably for several years, building a strong reputation in the manpower industry.
tags: establishment, history, 2082 bs, founding, experience
author: admin-udaan-7075

title: Is Udaan Agencies a licensed manpower company?
excerpt: Verify Udaan Agencies licensing and authorization
content: Yes, we are fully licensed and authorized by the Government of Nepal, Department of Foreign Employment, ensuring all our operations are legal and ethical. You can verify our license through the Nepal Department of Foreign Employment's official website.
tags: license, authorized, government, legal, department of foreign employment
author: admin-udaan-7075

title: Who is the founder of Udaan Agencies?
excerpt: Meet the founder and leadership of Udaan Agencies
content: Udaan Agencies was founded by Mr. Mausam Adhikari, dedicated to creating ethical and reliable pathways for Nepalese workers seeking employment opportunities both domestically and internationally.
tags: founder, mausam adhikari, leadership, ceo
author: admin-udaan-7075

title: What industries does Udaan Agencies specialize in?
excerpt: Industries and sectors covered by Udaan Agencies
content: We specialize in a wide array of sectors including construction, hospitality, healthcare, manufacturing, logistics, and 50+ other industries, catering to diverse skill sets and employment opportunities.
tags: industries, construction, hospitality, healthcare, manufacturing, logistics
author: admin-udaan-7075

title: What makes Udaan Agencies different from other agencies in Nepal?
excerpt: Unique advantages of choosing Udaan Agencies
content: Our difference lies in our transparent processes, ethical recruitment practices, and comprehensive end-to-end support for every candidate we place. We prioritize integrity and long-term relationships over short-term gains.
tags: difference, transparent, ethical, comprehensive support, unique
author: admin-udaan-7075

title: Does Udaan Agencies have international partners?
excerpt: Global partnerships and international network
content: Yes, we maintain strong partnerships with trusted employers and recruitment agencies across the Middle East, Malaysia, Japan, and other popular destinations, ensuring reliable job placements worldwide.
tags: international partners, middle east, malaysia, japan, global network
author: admin-udaan-7075

title: What services does Udaan Agencies offer?
excerpt: Complete overview of Udaan Agencies recruitment services
content:
Udaan Agencies is a leading manpower and recruitment agency in Nepal with two specialized departments:

  • Overseas Employment Department: Helps Nepali candidates secure jobs abroad, providing end-to-end support with visa processing, documentation, and relocation assistance.
  • Local Recruitment Department: Assists businesses within Nepal in finding qualified and reliable staff for various industries, streamlining the hiring process for companies.

We provide complete recruitment solutions including job placement, visa processing, documentation assistance, pre-departure orientation, and post-placement support.
tags: services, overseas employment, local recruitment, visa processing, comprehensive
author: admin-udaan-7075

title: Does Udaan Agencies provide overseas job opportunities?
excerpt: International employment opportunities through Udaan Agencies
content: Yes, our primary service is securing lucrative and legitimate overseas employment opportunities in multiple countries for Nepali citizens. We primarily place workers in GCC countries (Qatar, UAE, Saudi Arabia), Malaysia, Japan, and other emerging destinations across various sectors.
tags: overseas jobs, international employment, gcc countries, malaysia, japan, abroad
author: admin-udaan-7075

title: Does Udaan Agencies help with visa processing?
excerpt: Comprehensive visa processing support from Udaan Agencies
content: Yes, we provide complete guidance and handling of the visa application process, which is a critical part of our service for overseas employment. Our team assists you in preparing, verifying, and authenticating all necessary documents like passports, CVs, and educational certificates required for visa applications.
tags: visa processing, documentation, passport, certificates, visa application
author: admin-udaan-7075

title: Does Udaan Agencies provide pre-departure orientation?
excerpt: Essential pre-departure training and orientation services
content: Yes, a comprehensive pre-departure orientation is mandatory to prepare you for the new work environment and culture abroad. We offer specialized pre-departure training programs that include language skills, cultural orientation, and job-specific safety protocols to ensure your success overseas.
tags: pre-departure, orientation, training, language skills, cultural preparation, safety
author: admin-udaan-7075

title: Does Udaan Agencies also provide local jobs in Nepal?
excerpt: Local employment opportunities within Nepal
content: While our focus is on overseas employment, we also assist leading Nepali companies in finding qualified local staff for various roles. We act as a strategic local recruitment agency, handling the entire hiring lifecycle for businesses within Nepal.
tags: local jobs, nepal jobs, local recruitment, hiring, domestic employment
author: admin-udaan-7075

title: Can I apply online for jobs through Udaan Agencies?
excerpt: Online application process for job seekers
content: Yes, you can browse current vacancies and submit your application online through our official website and social media platforms. We also provide online support through live chat, email, and social media messaging platforms.
tags: online application, website, social media, digital platform, online support

title: Does Udaan Agencies offer free consultations?
excerpt: Initial consultation services for prospective candidates
content: Yes, we offer free initial consultations to understand your skills, experience, and career aspirations to guide you effectively. The initial career consultation and counseling session is completely free of charge for all prospective candidates.
tags: free consultation, career counseling, initial meeting, guidance, assessment

title: How can I apply for a job through Udaan Agencies?
excerpt: Step-by-step guide to applying for jobs through Udaan Agencies
content:
Applying for a job with Udaan Agencies is simple:

  1. Visit our office in Birtamod with your updated CV, citizenship certificate, and relevant educational and experience certificates
  2. Our consultants will guide you through available overseas job vacancies or local employment opportunities that match your profile
  3. You can also view current openings on our website and social media channels
  4. Submit your application online through our official website

Our team will contact you within 24 hours during business days for the next steps.
tags: apply jobs, application process, cv, documents, consultation, office visit
author: admin-udaan-7075

title: What documents are required to apply at Udaan Agencies?
excerpt: Complete list of documents needed for job application
content:
The basic documents required for job application are:

  • Updated CV/Resume
  • Valid Passport
  • Citizenship Certificate
  • Educational Certificates (SLC/SEE minimum)
  • Experience Letters (if applicable)
  • Passport-sized photographs

Specific requirements may vary by country and job role. Our consultants will provide you with a complete checklist tailored to your specific opportunity during consultation. You can also visit our office for detailed consultation.
tags: documents, requirements, passport, citizenship, certificates, cv, checklist
author: admin-udaan-7075

title: What types of jobs does Udaan Agencies offer abroad?
excerpt: Various international job opportunities available through Udaan Agencies
content:
We offer diverse roles across multiple sectors including:

  • Construction: Supervisors, laborers, technicians
  • Healthcare: Nurses, caregivers, medical assistants
  • Hospitality: Hotel staff, restaurant workers, housekeeping
  • Manufacturing: Factory workers, quality control, machine operators
  • Engineering: Civil, mechanical, electrical engineers
  • Logistics: Drivers, warehouse staff, delivery personnel
  • Domestic Services: Housekeepers, nannies, elderly care
  • Agriculture: Farm workers, greenhouse technicians

We cater to both skilled and unskilled workers across 50+ industries.
tags: job types, construction, healthcare, hospitality, manufacturing, engineering, skilled, unskilled
author: admin-udaan-7075

title: Can women apply through Udaan Agencies?
excerpt: Employment opportunities for women through Udaan Agencies
content:
Absolutely! We have many secure and rewarding job opportunities abroad specifically for women in various sectors:

  • Healthcare: Nurses, caregivers, medical assistants
  • Hospitality: Hotel housekeeping, restaurant service, front desk
  • Manufacturing: Quality control, assembly line, textile workers
  • Domestic Services: Housekeepers, nannies, elderly care
  • Beauty & Wellness: Salon workers, spa therapists

We ensure safe working conditions and proper accommodation for all our female candidates with reputable employers who respect women's rights and dignity.
tags: women jobs, female employment, healthcare, hospitality, safety, women rights
author: admin-udaan-7075

title: Which countries does Udaan Agencies send workers to?
excerpt: Countries and destinations for overseas employment
content: We primarily place workers in GCC countries (Qatar, UAE, Saudi Arabia), Malaysia, Japan, and other emerging destinations. Our strong partnerships with trusted employers span across the Middle East, Southeast Asia, and other popular employment destinations worldwide.

title: What is the process of job placement at Udaan Agencies?
excerpt: Step-by-step job placement procedure
content:
The process involves document submission, profile screening, employer interview, medical tests, visa processing, and final deployment. We ensure a systematic approach:

  1. Document submission and verification
  2. Profile screening and matching
  3. Employer interview coordination
  4. Medical examination guidance
  5. Visa processing assistance
  6. Pre-departure orientation
  7. Final deployment and support
tags: placement process, procedure, steps, interview, medical, deployment
author: admin-udaan-7075

title: How long does it take to get a job through Udaan Agencies?
excerpt: Expected timeframe for job placement process
content:
The timeline varies from a few weeks to several months, depending on the job role, destination country, and visa processing speed. Factors affecting timeline include:

  • Job role complexity and requirements
  • Destination country's visa processing time
  • Document preparation and verification
  • Medical examination scheduling
  • Employer interview arrangements

We keep candidates updated throughout the process.
tags: timeline, duration, processing time, visa, placement speed
author: admin-udaan-7075

title: Does Udaan Agencies charge service fees?
excerpt: Transparent fee structure for Udaan Agencies services
content:
Yes, a transparent service fee is charged for our comprehensive placement and processing services, as per Nepal government guidelines. Our fee structure includes:

  • Job sourcing and matching
  • Visa processing assistance
  • Documentation support
  • Pre-departure orientation
  • Medical examination guidance
  • Travel arrangements

All costs are discussed upfront and detailed in your service agreement contract with no hidden charges. We believe in complete transparency.
tags: service fees, transparent pricing, government guidelines, no hidden charges, contract
author: admin-udaan-7075

title: Can I pay service fees in installments?
excerpt: Flexible payment options for Udaan Agencies services
content:
Yes, we understand the financial challenges of overseas employment preparation. We can structure a flexible payment plan with installments to ease the financial burden on candidates. Payment options include:

  • Bank transfer
  • Cash payments
  • Digital payment methods
  • Installment plans (as per agreement)

Our consultants will work with you to create a payment schedule that fits your financial situation.
tags: installment payment, flexible payment, bank transfer, digital payment, financial assistance
author: admin-udaan-7075

title: How much does it cost to go abroad through Udaan Agencies?
excerpt: Cost structure for overseas employment services
content: The total cost varies significantly based on the destination country, job type, and associated visa and government fees. Our fees are competitive and fair, reflecting the high-quality, secure service we provide. We follow government-approved fee structures set by the Nepalese government for manpower agencies.
tags: cost, pricing, destination country, government fees, competitive rates

title: Are there hidden charges at Udaan Agencies?
excerpt: Transparency in pricing and fee structure
content: No, we believe in complete transparency. All costs are discussed upfront and detailed in your service agreement contract. There are no hidden charges - everything is clearly outlined in the contract with detailed fee breakdowns and open communication throughout the process.
tags: no hidden charges, transparency, contract, upfront pricing, clear fees

title: Does Udaan Agencies support workers after they go abroad?
excerpt: Comprehensive post-placement support for overseas workers
content:
Yes, we provide continuous post-placement support to address any issues that may arise during your employment abroad. Our support includes:

  • 24/7 emergency contact support
  • Assistance with workplace issues
  • Help with contract renewals
  • Guidance for job transfers (subject to regulations)
  • Repatriation support when needed
  • Family support guidance for remittances

Our commitment to you doesn't end when you reach your destination - we're here to support your entire overseas journey.
tags: post-placement support, 24/7 support, emergency assistance, contract renewal, aftercare

title: Does Udaan Agencies help if I face problems in a foreign country?
excerpt: Support for workers facing challenges abroad
content: Absolutely, our support team is available to assist you with any challenges you encounter while working overseas. We offer 24/7 emergency contact support for urgent situations requiring immediate intervention or assistance, and continuous guidance throughout your employment abroad.

title: Will Udaan Agencies help me return to Nepal if needed?
excerpt: Return assistance and repatriation services
content: Yes, we provide guidance and support for repatriation in cases of contract completion, termination, or emergency. We assist with the legal process and provide guidance on reintegrating and seeking new opportunities upon return to Nepal.

We maintain a clean record and have never been blacklisted by any government authority.
